basic.description: Introduction to the finite-element method; utilization of the direct approach for simple problems; brief discussion of the variational approach; the method of weighted residuals; Galerkin's Method; applications to heat conduction; elements and shape functions; inviscid fluid flow; creeping flow; solutions to the Navier-Stokes equation; discussion of a sample computer code. Three term-hours, lectures. P.H. Oosthuizen.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Thermo Fluid Engineering
